Articles.Content: Trekketes soul is sent to Lord Odi-*blasted apart*
*grabs trekketes soul, puts it back in body, like a boss*
That doesn't work that way.

That doesn't work that way.

Says you. I'm a Jedi. I get to do ANYTHING. *starts levitating*

*grabs trekketes soul, puts it back in body, like a boss*
This is real first Aid:)
Trekketes body still has a fatal stab wound. Her soul is immediately ejected to Odin.

Trekketes body still has a fatal stab wound. Her soul is immediately ejected to Odin.

I fixed that.

trollface.jpg
Her Brain is no longer functional because its oxygen starved. You can't fix that

Her Brain is no longer functional because its oxygen starved. You can't fix that

O RLY? *creates air from nothing, revives trekkete*

(can't wait till she reads this)
Her lungs don't work because her brain doesn't work!

Her lungs don't work because her brain doesn't work!

I fix brains. You know what? I fix EVERYTHING. YOU CANNOT DEFEAT ME!
That's just brilliant you guys. Now I get to enjoy PFL in Valhalla, while you guys never know what happens cause there's no way to bring her back to share it.
Hey, the summoning worked!

That's just brilliant you guys. Now I get to enjoy PFL in Valhalla, while you guys never know what happens cause there's no way to bring her back to share it.

Great one! I beg for forgiveness! The fools forced my hand!

Hey, the summoning worked!

Nonsense. I cannot be summoned except by tributing 1 "Nordic Ascendant" Tuner + 2 or more non-Tuner monsters.

I just happened to be on lunch break and thought I'd catch up on this madness.

Great one! I beg for forgiveness! The fools forced my hand!

That's what they all say.

They also all say that the bag of suspicious powder is not theirs.

*Revives Trekkette* Now we can know.

They all follow whatever leader take power in the forums. It was Chobit, now its you Odin

Edited May 24, 2013 by LeonG17

I have read the past few pages. I still have my sanity intact.

*summons Greater Demon +99999999*

*Revives Trekkette* Now we can know.

They all follow whatever leader take power in the forums. It was Vhobit, now its you Odin

I still obey only the great God-Empress:D
You don't obey her, you worship her with a shrine to sacrifice lambs to. Any reasons why?

You don't obey her, you worship her with a shrine to sacrifice lambs to. Any reasons why?
I don't know...

I don't know...

Perhaps you are under her control! *slaps Canopus multiple times* Snap out of it!
So, apparently, while I was playing Minecraft, I was sacrificed to Odin? That's even more entertaining than the omnipotent aliens bit I had going on yesterday!
Trekkete do you know if chobit will be here soon?

Don't worry, you have been revived! Now we think that Canopus is under Chobits control and we're trying to get him out of her control.

Edit: Do you stalk her Canopus?
No i just can't wait to ask about my Flags.
